item.title: Npcdrops
item.dc:creator: @Snaz Snaz
item.description:
@Snaz wrote:

My Npcdrops.cfg is completely different?
mines like this;

npcdrop = 2263 5509 1 10
npcdrop = 2263 5510 1 7
npcdrop = 2263 5512 1 5
npcdrop = 2263 5514 1 2
npcdrop = 2263 526 1 100
npcdrop = 2264 5509 1 10

          ^        ^     ^     ^
       [npcid]  [itemid][item   [percentage
                          amount]    of drop..]

Read full topic

and ags code is 35 :\

item.title: Npcdrops

item.description:
